sections.heading: Act, how cited.Sections 28-401 to 28-456
sections.text: 01 and 28-458 to 28-476 shall be known and may be cited as the Uniform Controlled Substances Act.SourceLaws 1977, LB 38, § 98;R.S.1943, (1995), § 28-438;Laws 2001, LB 113, § 17;Laws 2001, LB 398, § 2;Laws 2005, LB 117, § 2;Laws 2007, LB463, § 1120;Laws 2011,

sections.heading: 28-401 to 28-456.01 and 28-458 to 28-476 shall be known and may be cited as the Uniform Controlled Substances Act.
sections.text: 28-401 to 28-456.01 and 28-458 to 28-476 shall be known and may be cited as the Uniform Controlled Substances Act.
